Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The application ID of the application producing the record.
Columns.Name: ApplicationId

Columns.Description: The ID of the Spark Executor.
Columns.Name: ExecutorId

Columns.Description: The number of cores the Spark Executor has.
Columns.Name: ExecutorCores

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the Executor was added.
Columns.Name: AddedTime

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the Executor was removed.
Columns.Name: RemovedTime

Columns.Description: The reason the Executor was removed.
Columns.Name: RemovedReason

Columns.Description: The tenant ID of the cluster running the Executor.
Columns.Name: ClusterTenantId

Columns.Description: The type of node  running the Executor.
Columns.Name: Role

Columns.Description: The DNS name of the cluster running the Executor.
Columns.Name: ClusterDnsName

Columns.Description: The region of the cluster running the Executor.
Columns.Name: Region

Columns.Description: The IP Address of the node running the Executor.
Columns.Name: IpAddress

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the Executor.
Columns.Name: UserSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: The host the Executor ran on
Columns.Name: ExecutorHost

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
